original_title: Bryan Kohberger seeks prison transfer amid sexual assault threats | Fox News
article_summary: Bryan Kohberger, convicted for the murder of four University of Idaho students, is requesting a transfer from his current prison wing due to threats and harassment from other inmates. He has submitted a handwritten complaint to prison officials, citing "minute-by-minute verbal threats/harassment" and a desire to be moved to a quieter wing called B Block. Experts warn that Kohberger may be a bigger target due to his "weird" behavior and social awkwardness, similar to Jeffrey Dahmer.</s>
